I see one way to settle this now that Jasons feeling better, when all 
the council members are able to respond, they can take a vote on 
whether or not Lunarpines weapon is legal.

After that then We'll have a little duel in some remote location 
between Lunarpine and Arcangel and let the rest of the RPGers to 
decide when a mode is commited. If necessary we can even trust the 
council to post damage since we're obviously Biased.

We can work out the details if everyone agrees to these terms.

Majority rules, anyone against this match taking place would be 
excluded from judgement. 


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> (STOP with the useless OOC e-mails!  I DO NOT WANT TO WAKE UP WITH

each
